general_information.title: Model Name
general_information.body: Apple Macbook Air 2018 (13-inch With Retina Display)

display.title: Other Details
display.body: LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2560x1600 native resolution at 227 pixels per inch with support for millions of colours

connectivity.title: Wireless
connectivity.body: Wi-Fi : 802.11ac Wi-Fi wireless snetworking | IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n compatible

physical_specs.title: Ports
physical_specs.body: Two Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) ports with support for - Charging, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt (up to 40 Gbps), USB-C 3.1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps)

processor.title: Processor Details
processor.body: Turbo Boost up to 3.6GHz, with 4MB L3 cache

processor.title: GPU
processor.body: Intel UHD Graphics 617 | Support for Thunderbolt 3â€“enabled external graphics processors (eGPUs)

webcam_microphone.title: Video Support
webcam_microphone.body: Simultaneously supports full native resolution on the built-in display at millions of colours

webcam_microphone.title: Multiple Display
webcam_microphone.body: One external display with 5120x2880 resolution at up to 60Hz | Up to two external displays with 4096x2304 resolution at up to 60Hz

power.title: Battery and Power
power.body: Up to 12 hours wireless web | Up to 13 hours iTunes movie playback | Up to 30 days of standby time

power.title: Charging Adapter
power.body: 30W USB-C Power Adapter; USB-C power port

keyboard.title: Keyboard
keyboard.body: Full-sized backlit keyboard with:- 78 (US) or 79 (ISO) individual LED-backlit keys, including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys | Ambient light sensor

keyboard.title: Touchpad
keyboard.body: Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities; enables Force clicks, accelerators, pressure-sensitive drawing and Multi-Touch gestures

pre_installed_apps.title: Built-in Apps
pre_installed_apps.body: Photos, iMovie, GarageBand, Mail, Safari, Siri and more
